items.name: Safety Helmet Class E
items.description: High-voltage electrical work helmet with superior dielectric protection. Designed for linemen working on high-voltage power lines. Features adjustable suspension system for comfort during extended wear.

items.name: Full Body Safety Harness
items.description: Professional-grade full body harness for working at heights. Multiple attachment points, padded leg straps, and quick-connect buckles. Suitable for pole climbing and tower work.

items.name: Electrical Hazard Safety Boots
items.description: Steel toe safety boots with electrical hazard protection. Oil-resistant, slip-resistant sole. Provides protection against electrical shock up to 18,000V.

items.name: Insulated Gloves Class 0
items.description: Rubber insulating gloves for low voltage work up to 1000V AC. Tested and certified for electrical safety. Includes leather protector gloves.

items.name: Insulated Gloves Class 2
items.description: High-voltage rubber insulating gloves rated for 17,000V AC. Essential for medium voltage distribution work. Comes with leather protector gloves and storage bag.

items.name: Leather Protector Gloves
items.description: Heavy-duty leather protector gloves worn over rubber insulating gloves. Protects against cuts, abrasions, and punctures. Available in multiple sizes.

items.name: Insulated Combination Pliers
items.description: 1000V rated insulated pliers for electrical work. Ergonomic handles with two-color insulation for easy identification. Hardened cutting edges.

items.name: Insulated Screwdriver Set
items.description: Complete set of 7 insulated screwdrivers (flathead and Phillips). 1000V rated. Includes carrying case. Essential for electrical panel work.

items.name: Non-Contact Voltage Detector
items.description: Digital voltage detector with LED and audible alerts. Detects AC voltage from 90V to 1000V. Pocket clip and built-in flashlight. Battery included.

items.name: Hot Line Tool Kit
items.description: Telescopic hot stick with universal head attachments. Extends from 3ft to 12ft. Fiberglass construction. Includes hook, eye, and disconnect attachments.

items.name: Arc Flash Protection Suit
items.description: Complete arc-rated protective suit including jacket, bib overalls, and hood. 40 cal/cm² protection. Flame-resistant fabric with reflective trim.

items.name: Arc Flash Face Shield
items.description: Arc-rated face shield with 12 cal/cm² protection. Clear polycarbonate visor with anti-fog coating. Adjustable headgear for comfort.

items.name: Digital Multimeter CAT IV
items.description: Professional-grade digital multimeter rated for CAT IV 600V. Measures voltage, current, resistance, capacitance, frequency. True RMS. Includes test leads and carrying case.

items.name: AC/DC Clamp Meter
items.description: True RMS clamp meter for current measurement up to 1000A. Measures AC/DC voltage and current. CAT III 1000V rated. Large LCD display with backlight.

items.name: Digital Earth Resistance Tester
items.description: Measures earth resistance, soil resistivity, and ground voltage. 3-pole and 4-pole testing methods. Data storage and USB connectivity for reports.
